item.title: XPN Local - 08.23.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from Gh√∂sh and a playback of Nina Ryser's Indie Rock Hit Parade session, plus new music from Meet The Bug, Doll Spirit Vessell and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, August 23rd, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 08.30.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from Best Bear, a guest DJ set by Rachel Andie, new music by Jacqueline Constance, Petrol and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, August 30th, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 09.06.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from Friendship, a conversation with Abdur Rahman and Sinnia Brown, new music by Boon, Imani, Christina Ward and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, September 6, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 09.13.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from The Tisburys, a Philly-centric preview of XPNFest, new music by Alex G, Harrowgrove, Laura Lizcano and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, September 13, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 09.20.2022
item.description: New music from Shannen Moser, Flatwaves, Ruby The Hatchet, and more on WXPN Local from September 20, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 09.27.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from The Ire, previews of Champagne Jam 2022 and You Too Fest, new music from Ruby The Hatchet, Zeek Burse, Brothers, and more on WXPN Local from September 27, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 10.04.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from Don McCloskey, new music by Madison McFerrin, Rentboy, Cliff Hillis and more on WXPN Local from October 4, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 10.18.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from Vixen 77, autumnal October sounds from Screamcloud, Blanketflowers, and Harrowgrove, and more on WXPN Local from October 4, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 10.25.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from Knifeplay, new music from Toby Leaman and Sug Daniels, and pre-Halloween sounds from House Plant, Puppy Angst, The Ire, and more on WXPN Local from October 25, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 11.01.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from Queasy, new music from DELL-P, The Side Chicks, and Miri Devora, a Phillies anthem by SNACKTIME and more on WXPN Local from November 1, 2022.
